isDisplaySpecific.value: A flag indicating whether this displayGroup is a single display displayGroup

dynamicCriteria.value: Criteria for this dynamic group. A comma separated set of regular expressions to apply

dynamicCriteriaLogicalOperator.value: Which logical operator should be used when filtering by multiple dynamic criteria? OR|AND

dynamicCriteriaTags.value: Criteria for this dynamic group. A comma separated set of tags to apply, it should be integer

dynamicCriteriaExactTags.value: Flag indicating whether to filter by exact Tag match,it should be integer

dynamicCriteriaTagsLogicalOperator.value: Which logical operator should be used when filtering by multiple Tags? OR|AND

userId.value: The UserId who owns this display group, it should be an integer

bandwidthLimit.value: The display bandwidth limit, it should be an integer

groupsWithPermissions.value: A comma separated list of groups/users with permissions to this DisplayGroup

createdDt.value: The datetime this entity was created

modifiedDt.value: The datetime this entity was last modified

folderId.value: The id of the Folder this Display Group belongs to, it should be an integer

permissionsFolderId.value: The id of the Folder responsible for providing permissions for this Display Group, it should be an integer
